name: Dodaj pracownika do stacji
query: INSERT INTO STATIONWORKER (ID, CAR_STATION_ID, NAME, SURNAME, PHONE) VALUES (99999, 123, 'George', 'Nowak', 123456789)

name: Samochody, które były naprawiane przez więcej niż X firm
query: WITH REPAIRING_COMPANIES AS (SELECT C2.ID, C2.MODEL, COUNT(C2.ID) REPAIRS FROM COMPANY JOIN INVOICE I2 on COMPANY.ID = I2.COMPANY_ID JOIN INSPECTION I on I2.ID = I.INVOICE_ID JOIN CAR C2 on C2.ID = I.CAR_ID GROUP BY C2.ID, C2.MODEL)  SELECT * FROM REPAIRING_COMPANIES WHERE REPAIRS > 2

name: Top X miast w ktorych wypozyczane sa samochody
query: WITH GROUPED_RENTALS AS ( SELECT START_STATION_ID, COUNT(ID) RENTALS FROM RENTALHISTORY RH GROUP BY START_STATION_ID),  ORDERED AS ( SELECT L.CITY, RENTALS FROM LOCATION L JOIN CARSTATION C2 on L.ID = C2.LOCATION_ID JOIN GROUPED_RENTALS GR ON GR.START_STATION_ID = C2.ID ORDER BY RENTALS DESC )  SELECT * FROM ORDERED WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

name: Dodaj znizke do trwajacych wypozyczen rozpoczetych w danym miescie w okreslonym czasie
query: UPDATE PAYMENT SET DISCOUNT = DISCOUNT + 5, COST = COST * 0.90 WHERE STATUS_ID = (SELECT ID FROM PAYMENTSTATUS WHERE STATUS = 'waiting') AND ID = (SELECT PAYMENT_ID FROM RENTALHISTORY H JOIN CARSTATION CS ON CS.ID = H.START_STATION_ID JOIN LOCATION L on CS.LOCATION_ID = L.ID WHERE START_DATE BETWEEN '01/01/2017' AND '31/12/2017' AND L.CITY = 'Hannover')

name: Wystawienie faktury za naprawe - naprawa samochodu (available)
query: UPDATE CAR SET AVAILABLE = 'true' WHERE ID = 36

name: Wystawienie faktury za naprawe - dodanie kosztow naprawy do oplaty za wypozyczenie
query: INSERT INTO INVOICE(ID, STATUS_ID, COMPANY_ID, SUMMARY_COST, EXPOSURE_DATE, PAYMENT_DATE, EXPIRE_DATE) VALUES (99999, (SELECT ID FROM PAYMENTSTATUS WHERE STATUS = 'waiting'), 20, 200.0, TO_DATE('2017/12/05', 'yyyy/mm/dd'), TO_DATE('2018/12/05', 'yyyy/mm/dd'), TO_DATE('2019/12/05', 'yyyy/mm/dd'))

name: Wystawienie faktury za naprawe - zmiana statusu wszystkich uszkodzen
query: UPDATE DAMAGE SET STATUS_ID  = (SELECT ID FROM DAMAGESTATUS WHERE STATUS = 'repaired'), INVOICE_ID = (SELECT MAX(ROWNUM) FROM INVOICE) WHERE CAR_ID = 36

name: Wystawienie faktury za naprawe #5
query: SELECT ID FROM INVOICE WHERE ROWNUM = (SELECT MAX(ROWNUM) FROM INVOICE)

name: Wystawienie faktury za naprawe #6
query: UPDATE PAYMENT SET COST = COST + (SELECT SUMMARY_COST FROM INVOICE WHERE ROWNUM = (SELECT MAX(ROWNUM) FROM INVOICE)) WHERE ID = (SELECT PAYMENT_ID FROM RENTALHISTORY WHERE CAR_ID = 36)

name: Uzytkownicy ktorzy w zadanym okresie czasu mieli kontakt z konkretnym pracownikiem (coronavirus)
query: WITH LOOKING_S_WORKER AS (SELECT CAR_STATION_ID FROM STATIONWORKER WHERE SURNAME = 'Aleevy')  SELECT USR.ID, DOCUMENT_TYPE_ID, TITLE, NAME, SURNAME, EMAIL, PHONE FROM SYSTEMUSER USR JOIN RENTALHISTORY R on USR.ID = R.USER_ID JOIN CARSTATION CS ON R.START_STATION_ID = CS.ID OR R.END_STATION_ID = CS.ID JOIN LOOKING_S_WORKER LSW ON LSW.CAR_STATION_ID = CS.ID WHERE START_DATE > '01/01/2017' AND END_DATE < '31/12/2018'
